name: Lightning Shield
text:
Equip to a Thunder-type monster you control. You can only control 1 "Lightning Shield." Each time a Spell Card is activated: You can increase a face-up Thunder monster's ATK by 100. If you do, you can negate the effect(s) of that Spell, and if you do that, destroy this card. 

Concept by TheLoneCarrot/bloco100
